definitions.definition: Lacking worldly experience , wisdom , or judgement ; unsophisticated .
Not having been exposed to something.
Produced in a simple, childlike style, deliberately rejecting sophisticated techniques.
Intuitive ; designed to follow the way ordinary people approach a problem.

main_definition: Lacking worldly experience , wisdom , or judgement ; unsophisticated .
secondary_definitions: Not having been exposed to something.
( of art ) Produced in a simple, childlike style, deliberately rejecting sophisticated techniques.
( computing ) Intuitive ; designed to follow the way ordinary people approach a problem.
